reviews.review_msg: if u can take the course with smo else, pls do. although he is sweet, he is a horrible professor. always late, has no idea what he is teaching, makes numerous errors, and never posts stuff on time, so hard to reach out of class and in class. clearly has no dedication towards teaching his students. be prepared to study on your own

If I could give a 0 I would. Late to lectures, didn't upload filled notes for a long time, does not respond to emails, can't really talk in person either. The final exam was extremely unreasonable, and it was worth 50% of our grade. Did all my hw, looked at quizzes/midterms/practice finals, still the final was stuff I haven't seen before.

He has a fun personality but it doesn't matter because his lectures are a mess. He's always late and his notes are poorly organized and uploaded late. Does not reply to inquiries outside class. The final was extremely difficult and unfair and is worth 50% of the total grade. Do not take this course with him unless you want to watch your GPA plummet
He was always late for class and the lectures on made me more confused about the material.

always late, never was able to get through a whole lecture. the small amount of stuff we did get through was very surface level. made so many algebra mistakes, at least 5 per lecture. seems to not really care about the class that much. that being said tests were quite fair but get ready to self teach.

You're better off studying the online lecture videos then listening to Goddyn most of the time. While Goddyn is a nice professor, he goes through material too quickly, makes wayyyy too many mistakes on every lecture, and typically submits new information quite late. Expect to rely on studying through the textbook and homework.

colin is a good prof. he is funny, a bit sarcastic, and definitely helpful if you ask! he is really available for help in the open lab and stuff, i would say. lectures are meh. tests are HARD, but not impossible if you study  do homework. i have no real complaints. you basically only need the textbook for the homework
